definitions: relating to the reason or reasons for acting or behaving in a particular way

examples.text: concern for the poor remains a strong motivational factor in my thinking

shortDefinitions: relating to reason or reasons for acting or behaving in particular way

definitions: designed to promote the desire or willingness to do or achieve something

examples.text: fear is used as a motivational tool

shortDefinitions: designed to promote desire or willingness to do or achieve something
